DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective compare difference pain score radial arterial puncture use insulin needle versus standard 23G hypodermic needle .
DOC.brief_title: Arterial Puncture Using Insulin Syringe Less Painful Than Standard Syringe
DOC.detailed_description: In randomise , crossover design , healthy volunteer recruit receive bilateral radial arterial puncture . They assign receive either insulin standard needle first puncture use block randomisation . The primary outcome pain score measure 100mm visual analogue scale ( VAS ) secondary outcomes procedural complication rate haemolysis .
DOC.criteria: age 21 concurrent antipyretic use last 24 hr , presence painful condition eg fracture , rheumatoid arthritis history peripheral vascular disease
